explains: n. 殖民主义，殖民政策

sentences.en: Marx never lost an opportunity to castigate colonialism.
sentences.cn: 马克思从不放过任何谴责殖民主义的机会。

sentences.en: Before colonialism, gender was more salient in central Kenya than it was in Ghana, although age was still crucial in determining authority.
sentences.cn: 在殖民主义之前，性别在肯尼亚中部比在加纳更为突出，尽管年龄仍然是决定权力的关键因素。

sentences.en: In a 1984 book, Claire C, Robertson argued that, before colonialism, age was a more important indicator of status and authority than gender in Ghana and in Africa generally.
sentences.cn: 在1984年的一本书中，克莱尔· C ·罗伯逊认为，在殖民主义出现之前，在加纳和整个非洲，年龄是地位和权威的一个更重要的指标，而不是性别。
